main event: A bright silver colored object was spotted over Robins AFB, GA on November 6, 1957, hovering at times before continuing westward and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 3 minutes.
It was round or elliptical in shape and appeared to be hovering at times.
The object was described as bright silver in color.
The observer was a civilian located 1 mile west of Robins AFB, Georgia.
No unusual activity or conditions that might account for the sighting were reported.
